oai_dc:dc.dc:title: LATERAL DISTRIBUTIONS OF WATER, SALT, AND SEDIMENT TRANSPORT IN A PARTLY MIXED ESTUARY
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Uncles, R.J.
Elliott, R.C.A.
Weston, S.A.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: sediment transport
lateral distribution
salt distribution
estuary
mixed estuary
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The transverse structure of the residual transport of water, salt and suspended sediment in the upper reaches of the Tamar Estuary is investigated. Data were obtained at three cross-sections for spring and neap tides. The transport for each variable is analyzed in terms of the governing physical processes.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 19 (1984): Proceedings of 19th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Houston, Texas, 1984.; 204
